data.meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.
data.sentence: The word فَكَانَتْ comes from the root ك و ن and is associated with the meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.

data.meanings: to be high/lofty, raised, name, attribute. samawat - heights/heavens/rain, raining clouds. ismun - mark of identification by which one is recognised. It is a derivation of wsm (pl. asma). ism - stands for a distinguishing mark of a thing, sometimes said to signify its reality.
data.sentence: The word السَّمَاءُ comes from the root س م و and is associated with the meanings: to be high/lofty, raised, name, attribute. samawat - heights/heavens/rain, raining clouds. ismun - mark of identification by which one is recognised. It is a derivation of wsm (pl. asma). ism - stands for a distinguishing mark of a thing, sometimes said to signify its reality.

data.meanings: pass along the way, cross, open a way/passage/vent/channel, cut/split/divided/clave/ripped/tore.
data.sentence: The word انْشَقَّتِ comes from the root ش ق ق and is associated with the meanings: pass along the way, cross, open a way/passage/vent/channel, cut/split/divided/clave/ripped/tore.

data.meanings: to be present, arrive at (any water to drink), go down into, draw near to (a place).
data.sentence: The word وَرْدَةً comes from the root و ر د and is associated with the meanings: to be present, arrive at (any water to drink), go down into, draw near to (a place).

data.meanings: To anoint, strike (with a stick), moisten, blandish, pleasantly smooth, agreeable and suave, dissemble with, coax, be pliant, grease, dis-simulate.
data.sentence: The word كَالدِّهَانِ comes from the root د ه ن and is associated with the meanings: To anoint, strike (with a stick), moisten, blandish, pleasantly smooth, agreeable and suave, dissemble with, coax, be pliant, grease, dis-simulate.
